Package us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.util

Class Price

java.lang.Object
us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.util.Price
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable, Comparable<Price>, ConfigurationSerializable
public final class Price extends Object implements ConfigurationSerializable, Comparable<Price>, Externalizable
Utility Class for creating a Price with an Economy
